about_the_game:
Chop Chop Guys is a game where you can run around strange levels, dodging eggs that explode on your head. Or shoot other dummies with splattering paint. Or roll on your stomach down a snow slope, trying not to crash into a pole under the gaze of shaking mammoths. Stomp on the disco floor and play darts with YOURSELF. In other words, do a lot of mind-blowing and amusing things.

For participating in competitions, you will be awarded J-Cash (now all games have some weird bucks, so we won't lag behind), which you can spend on costumes, body materials, and emotion animations for your Bob. By the way, Bob is a gentle name for our character. Don't ask why ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

A wardrobe to envy!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 560 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 945 @ 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 or AMD Radeon HD 5870
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or AMD FX-8120 @ 3.1 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Join the madness in Chop Chop Guys, a wild competition of dim-witted characters racing through a world of zany traps. Lose your head? No problem! You don't need it to reach the finish line!
